snippet: Citing “a problem with alcohol,” Mayor Rob Ford of Toronto said late Wednesday that he was temporarily stepping aside from his mayoral re-election campaign and seeking “professional help.”
abstract: Toronto Mayor Rob Ford, citing 'a problem with alcohol,' says he is temporarily stepping aside from his mayoral re-election campaign and seeking 'professional help'; statement follows online posting of image that appears to show him smoking crack cocaine, second such incident to be made public.
lead_paragraph: Citing “a problem with alcohol,” Mayor Rob Ford of Toronto said late Wednesday that he was temporarily stepping aside from his mayoral re-election campaign and seeking “professional help.”

headline.main: Toronto Mayor Said to Seek Help
